testcase.classname: Login to developer.salesforce.com and check the functionalities
testcase.name: Login to developer.salesforce.com URL

testcase.classname: Login to developer.salesforce.com and check the functionalities
testcase.name: Search for Writing Tests and Assert Writing test page is listed
testcase.system-out: Given I enter the Writing Tests in the searchbox and click Enter key........passed Then I should see the result page...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Login to developer.salesforce.com and check the functionalities
testcase.name: Retrieve the links in the contents, click each one of them and verify links are working
testcase.system-out: Given Click on the Writing tests page and check the links under contents....passed Then I should see each clicked 'contents' link opened.......................passed

testcase.classname: Login to developer.salesforce.com and check the functionalities
testcase.name: On the Writing Tests Page, Click Link Testing Apex and Verify Testing Apex page is loaded and close the Browser.
testcase.system-out: Given I Search for Writing Tests and click Enter key........................passed When I am on Writing Tests Page.............................................passed And I Click the Link 'Testing Apex'.........................................passed Then I Verify Testing Apex page is loaded...................................passed
